document_data.caption: A map showing Gust on the Golden Water.
document_data.name: Gust
document_data.mainbody: '''Gust''' was a small town located in the nation of [[Durpar]] during the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas|B1dSWIc}}
document_data.Geography: Gust was located in southeastern Durpar along the southern coast of the [[Golden Water]]. The town lay northeast of the [[Curna Mountains]] and southeast of nearby [[Ormpe]].
